title: Bug 15790Java file icons too fat in editor tabs
OB: Bug 15790Java file icons too fat in editor tabs
SR: Eclipse 20020508All platforms1) Open a .txt file.2) Open a .java fileLook at the space between the edge of the tab and the image and the edge of theimage and the start of the text.The image used for .java has extra space on the left and right edges.This isusing up pixels that would be better used for displaying the file name.
